testSMS.title: SMS Test
testSMS.smsTestDescription: The SMS test has a cost that will be deducted directly from the current balance.
testSMS.smsSelectDescription: Select the number from which you want to send the test and the number you want it to arrive at.
testSMS.writeMessageOrSelect: Write a message or select a template.
testSMS.charactersCounter: {{count}}/160 characters to complete the message in a single send.
testSMS.tooltipTenDigits: The phone number must include the country code
